mapper.select: SELECT k.id,k.value_index,k.goal,k.type, case k.type when 1 then value else "" end value_name FROM key_rule k,auto_value a where k.value_index=a.id

SELECT k.id,k.value_index,k.goal,k.type, case k.type when 3 then c.level when 4 then hs.sec_type_name when 7 then hs.sec_type_name else a.value end value_name FROM key_rule k left join chx c on k.value_index=c.id left join health_select hs on hs.id=k.value_index ,auto_value a where k.value_index=a.id
